virtual Point libMesh::Edge::quasicircumcenter ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtualinherited
返回
The "circumcenter of mass" (area-weighted average of triangulation circumcenters) of the element.

Currently ignores curvature of element edges, which makes this trivial in 1D.

Definition: elem.h:2079
const Elem * libMesh::Elem::reference_elem ( ) const
inherited
返回
A pointer to the "reference element" associated with this element. The reference element is the image of this element in reference parametric space. Importantly, it is not an actual element in the mesh, but rather a Singleton-type object, so for example all Quad4 elements share the same reference_elem().

在文件 elem_refinement.C 第 87 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::_children, libMesh::Elem::active(), libMesh::MeshRefinement::add_elem(), libMesh::MeshRefinement::add_node(), libMesh::Elem::ancestor(), libMesh::Elem::build(), libMesh::Elem::child_ptr(), libMesh::Elem::INACTIVE, libMesh::Elem::JUST_REFINED, libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::Elem::n_children(), libMesh::DofObject::n_extra_integers(), libMesh::DofObject::n_systems(), libMesh::Elem::p_level(), libMesh::Elem::p_refinement_flag(), libMesh::Elem::parent(), libMesh::Elem::REFINE, libMesh::Elem::refinement_flag(), libMesh::remote_elem, libMesh::DofObject::set_extra_integer(), libMesh::DofObject::set_n_systems(), libMesh::Elem::set_p_level(), libMesh::Elem::set_p_refinement_flag(), libMesh::Elem::set_refinement_flag(), libMesh::Elem::subactive() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::type().

88 {
89  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->refinement_flag(), Elem::REFINE);
90  libmesh_assert (this->active());
91 
92  const unsigned int nc = this->n_children();
93 
94  // Create my children if necessary
95  if (!_children)
96  {
97  _children = std::make_unique<Elem *[]>(nc);
98 
99  unsigned int parent_p_level = this->p_level();
100  const unsigned int nei = this->n_extra_integers();
101  for (unsigned int c = 0; c != nc; c++)
102  {
103  auto current_child = Elem::build(this->type(), this);
104  _children[c] = current_child.get();
105 
106  current_child->set_refinement_flag(Elem::JUST_REFINED);
107  current_child->set_p_level(parent_p_level);
108  current_child->set_p_refinement_flag(this->p_refinement_flag());
109 
110  for (auto cnode : current_child->node_index_range())
111  {
112  Node * node =
113  mesh_refinement.add_node(*this, c, cnode,
114  current_child->processor_id());
115  node->set_n_systems (this->n_systems());
116  current_child->set_node(cnode) = node;
117  }
118 
119  Elem * added_child = mesh_refinement.add_elem (std::move(current_child));
120  added_child->set_n_systems(this->n_systems());
121  libmesh_assert_equal_to (added_child->n_extra_integers(),
122  this->n_extra_integers());
123  for (unsigned int i=0; i != nei; ++i)
124  added_child->set_extra_integer(i, this->get_extra_integer(i));
125  }
126  }
127  else
128  {
129  unsigned int parent_p_level = this->p_level();
130  for (unsigned int c = 0; c != nc; c++)
131  {
132  Elem * current_child = this->child_ptr(c);
133  if (current_child != remote_elem)
134  {
135  libmesh_assert(current_child->subactive());
136  current_child->set_refinement_flag(Elem::JUST_REFINED);
137  current_child->set_p_level(parent_p_level);
138  current_child->set_p_refinement_flag(this->p_refinement_flag());
139  }
140  }
141  }
142 
143  // Un-set my refinement flag now
144  this->set_refinement_flag(Elem::INACTIVE);
145 
146  // Leave the p refinement flag set - we will need that later to get
147  // projection operations correct
148  // this->set_p_refinement_flag(Elem::INACTIVE);
149 
150 #ifndef NDEBUG
151  for (unsigned int c = 0; c != nc; c++)
152  if (this->child_ptr(c) != remote_elem)
153  {
154  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->child_ptr(c)->parent(), this);
155  libmesh_assert(this->child_ptr(c)->active());
156  }
157 #endif
158  libmesh_assert (this->ancestor());
159 }

unsigned char _rflag
h refinement flag.
Definition: elem.h:2092
void libMesh::Elem::remove_links_to_me ( )
inherited

Resets this element's neighbors' appropriate neighbor pointers and its parent's and children's appropriate pointers to point to null instead of to this.

To be used before an element is deleted from a mesh.

在文件 elem.C 第 1445 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::has_children(), libMesh::Elem::level(), libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::Elem::neighbor_ptr_range(), libMesh::Elem::parent(), libMesh::remote_elem , 以及 libMesh::Elem::subactive().

1446 {
1447  libmesh_assert_not_equal_to (this, remote_elem);
1448 
1449  // We need to have handled any children first
1450 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
1451  libmesh_assert (!this->has_children());
1452 #endif
1453 
1454  // Nullify any neighbor links
1455  for (auto neigh : this->neighbor_ptr_range())
1456  {
1457  if (neigh && neigh != remote_elem)
1458  {
1459  // My neighbor should never be more refined than me; my real
1460  // neighbor would have been its parent in that case.
1461  libmesh_assert_greater_equal (this->level(), neigh->level());
1462 
1463  if (this->level() == neigh->level() &&
1464  neigh->has_neighbor(this))
1465  {
1466 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
1467  // My neighbor may have descendants which also consider me a
1468  // neighbor
1469  std::vector<Elem *> family;
1470  neigh->total_family_tree_by_neighbor (family, this);
1471 
1472  for (auto & n : family)
1473  {
1474  libmesh_assert (n);
1475  if (n->is_remote())
1476  continue;
1477  unsigned int my_s = n->which_neighbor_am_i(this);
1478  libmesh_assert_less (my_s, n->n_neighbors());
1479  libmesh_assert_equal_to (n->neighbor_ptr(my_s), this);
1480  n->set_neighbor(my_s, nullptr);
1481  }
1482 #else
1483  unsigned int my_s = neigh->which_neighbor_am_i(this);
1484  libmesh_assert_less (my_s, neigh->n_neighbors());
1485  libmesh_assert_equal_to (neigh->neighbor_ptr(my_s), this);
1486  neigh->set_neighbor(my_s, nullptr);
1487 #endif
1488  }
1489 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
1490  // Even if my neighbor doesn't link back to me, it might
1491  // have subactive descendants which do
1492  else if (neigh->has_children())
1493  {
1494  // If my neighbor at the same level doesn't have me as a
1495  // neighbor, I must be subactive
1496  libmesh_assert(this->level() > neigh->level() ||
1497  this->subactive());
1498 
1499  // My neighbor must have some ancestor of mine as a
1500  // neighbor
1501  Elem * my_ancestor = this->parent();
1502  libmesh_assert(my_ancestor);
1503  while (!neigh->has_neighbor(my_ancestor))
1504  {
1505  my_ancestor = my_ancestor->parent();
1506  libmesh_assert(my_ancestor);
1507  }
1508 
1509  // My neighbor may have descendants which consider me a
1510  // neighbor
1511  std::vector<Elem *> family;
1512  neigh->total_family_tree_by_subneighbor (family, my_ancestor, this);
1513 
1514  for (auto & n : family)
1515  {
1516  libmesh_assert (n);
1517  if (n->is_remote())
1518  continue;
1519  unsigned int my_s = n->which_neighbor_am_i(this);
1520  libmesh_assert_less (my_s, n->n_neighbors());
1521  libmesh_assert_equal_to (n->neighbor_ptr(my_s), this);
1522  n->set_neighbor(my_s, nullptr);
1523  }
1524  }
1525 #endif
1526  }
1527  }
1528 
1529 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
1530  // We can't currently delete a child with a parent!
1531  libmesh_assert (!this->parent());
1532 #endif
1533 }

unsigned short int libMesh::Elem::second_order_adjacent_vertex ( const unsigned int  n,
const unsigned int  v 
) const
virtualinherited
返回
The element-local number of the vertex that defines the second-order node, or 0 for linear elements.
注解
The value is always less than this->n_vertices(), while n has to be greater than or equal to this->n_vertices().

被 libMesh::Prism21, libMesh::Pyramid18, libMesh::Prism20, libMesh::Prism18, libMesh::Pyramid14, libMesh::Hex27, libMesh::Tet14, libMesh::Prism15, libMesh::InfHex18, libMesh::Pyramid13, libMesh::Tet10, libMesh::Hex20, libMesh::Tri7, libMesh::InfHex16, libMesh::Tri6, libMesh::Quad9, libMesh::InfPrism12, libMesh::Quad8, libMesh::InfQuad6, libMesh::Edge4 , 以及 libMesh::Edge3 重载.

在文件 elem.C 第 2672 行定义.

参考自 libMesh::MeshTools::Modification::smooth().

2674 {
2675  // for linear elements, always return 0
2676  return 0;
2677 }
std::pair< unsigned short int, unsigned short int > libMesh::Elem::second_order_child_vertex ( const unsigned int  n) const
virtualinherited
返回
A pair (c,v), where c == child index, and v == element-local index of the second-order node on the parent element. For linear elements, (0,0) is returned.
注解
The return values are always less than this->n_children() and this->child_ptr(c)->n_vertices().
n has to be greater than or equal to this->n_vertices().
On refined second-order elements, the return value will satisfy this->node_ptr(n) == this->child_ptr(c)->node_ptr(v).

被 libMesh::Prism21, libMesh::Prism20, libMesh::Prism18, libMesh::Hex27, libMesh::Tet14, libMesh::Prism15, libMesh::InfHex18, libMesh::Tet10, libMesh::Hex20, libMesh::Tri7, libMesh::InfHex16, libMesh::Tri6, libMesh::Quad9, libMesh::InfPrism12, libMesh::Quad8, libMesh::InfQuad6 , 以及 libMesh::Edge3 重载.

在文件 elem.C 第 2682 行定义.

2683 {
2684  // for linear elements, always return 0
2685  return std::pair<unsigned short int, unsigned short int>(0,0);
2686 }
ElemType libMesh::Elem::second_order_equivalent_type ( const ElemType  et,
const bool  full_ordered = true 
)
staticinherited
返回
The ElemType of the associated second-order element (which will be the same as the input if the input is already a second-order ElemType) or INVALID_ELEM for elements that cannot be converted into higher order equivalents.

For example, when this is a TET4, then TET10 is returned.

For some elements, there exist two second-order equivalents, e.g. for Quad4 there is Quad8 and Quad9. When the optional full_ordered is true, then QUAD9 is returned. When full_ordered is false, then QUAD8 is returned.

在文件 elem.C 第 2758 行定义.

参考 libMesh::EDGE2, libMesh::EDGE3, libMesh::EDGE4, libMesh::Utility::enum_to_string(), libMesh::HEX20, libMesh::HEX27, libMesh::HEX8, libMesh::INFEDGE2, libMesh::INFHEX16, libMesh::INFHEX18, libMesh::INFHEX8, libMesh::INFPRISM12, libMesh::INFPRISM6, libMesh::INFQUAD4, libMesh::INFQUAD6, libMesh::NODEELEM, libMesh::PRISM15, libMesh::PRISM18, libMesh::PRISM20, libMesh::PRISM21, libMesh::PRISM6, libMesh::PYRAMID13, libMesh::PYRAMID14, libMesh::PYRAMID18, libMesh::PYRAMID5, libMesh::QUAD4, libMesh::QUAD8, libMesh::QUAD9, libMesh::QUADSHELL4, libMesh::QUADSHELL8, libMesh::TET10, libMesh::TET14, libMesh::TET4, libMesh::TRI3, libMesh::TRI6, libMesh::TRI7 , 以及 libMesh::TRISHELL3.

参考自 libMesh::UnstructuredMesh::all_second_order_range(), libMesh::Elem::bracketing_nodes() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::parent_bracketing_nodes().

2760 {
2761  switch (et)
2762  {
2763  case NODEELEM:
2764  return NODEELEM;
2765  case EDGE2:
2766  case EDGE3:
2767  {
2768  // full_ordered not relevant
2769  return EDGE3;
2770  }
2771 
2772  case EDGE4:
2773  {
2774  // full_ordered not relevant
2775  return EDGE4;
2776  }
2777 
2778  case TRI3:
2779  case TRI6:
2780  {
2781  // full_ordered not relevant
2782  return TRI6;
2783  }
2784 
2785  case TRI7:
2786  return TRI7;
2787 
2788  // Currently there is no TRISHELL6, so similarly to other types
2789  // where this is the case, we just return the input.
2790  case TRISHELL3:
2791  return TRISHELL3;
2792 
2793  case QUAD4:
2794  case QUAD8:
2795  {
2796  if (full_ordered)
2797  return QUAD9;
2798  else
2799  return QUAD8;
2800  }
2801 
2802  case QUADSHELL4:
2803  case QUADSHELL8:
2804  {
2805  // There is no QUADSHELL9, so in that sense QUADSHELL8 is the
2806  // "full ordered" element.
2807  return QUADSHELL8;
2808  }
2809 
2810  case QUAD9:
2811  {
2812  // full_ordered not relevant
2813  return QUAD9;
2814  }
2815 
2816  case TET4:
2817  case TET10:
2818  {
2819  // full_ordered not relevant
2820  return TET10;
2821  }
2822 
2823  case TET14:
2824  return TET14;
2825 
2826  case HEX8:
2827  case HEX20:
2828  {
2829  // see below how this correlates with INFHEX8
2830  if (full_ordered)
2831  return HEX27;
2832  else
2833  return HEX20;
2834  }
2835 
2836  case HEX27:
2837  {
2838  // full_ordered not relevant
2839  return HEX27;
2840  }
2841 
2842  case PRISM6:
2843  case PRISM15:
2844  {
2845  if (full_ordered)
2846  return PRISM18;
2847  else
2848  return PRISM15;
2849  }
2850 
2851  // full_ordered not relevant, already fully second order
2852  case PRISM18:
2853  return PRISM18;
2854  case PRISM20:
2855  return PRISM20;
2856  case PRISM21:
2857  return PRISM21;
2858  case PYRAMID18:
2859  return PYRAMID18;
2860 
2861  case PYRAMID5:
2862  case PYRAMID13:
2863  {
2864  if (full_ordered)
2865  return PYRAMID14;
2866  else
2867  return PYRAMID13;
2868  }
2869 
2870  case PYRAMID14:
2871  {
2872  // full_ordered not relevant
2873  return PYRAMID14;
2874  }
2875 
2876 
2877 
2878 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_INFINITE_ELEMENTS
2879 
2880  // infinite elements
2881  case INFEDGE2:
2882  {
2883  return INFEDGE2;
2884  }
2885 
2886  case INFQUAD4:
2887  case INFQUAD6:
2888  {
2889  // full_ordered not relevant
2890  return INFQUAD6;
2891  }
2892 
2893  case INFHEX8:
2894  case INFHEX16:
2895  {
2896  /*
2897  * Note that this matches with \p Hex8:
2898  * For full-ordered, \p InfHex18 and \p Hex27
2899  * belong together, and for not full-ordered,
2900  * \p InfHex16 and \p Hex20 belong together.
2901  */
2902  if (full_ordered)
2903  return INFHEX18;
2904  else
2905  return INFHEX16;
2906  }
2907 
2908  case INFHEX18:
2909  {
2910  // full_ordered not relevant
2911  return INFHEX18;
2912  }
2913 
2914  case INFPRISM6:
2915  case INFPRISM12:
2916  {
2917  // full_ordered not relevant
2918  return INFPRISM12;
2919  }
2920 
2921 #endif
2922 
2923 
2924  default:
2925  {
2926  // what did we miss?
2927  libmesh_error_msg("No second order equivalent element type for et = "
2928  << Utility::enum_to_string(et));
2929  }
2930  }
2931 }

Sets the global degree of freedom number for variable var, component comp for system s associated with this DofObject.

在文件 dof_object.C 第 454 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::_idx_buf, libMesh::DofObject::dof_number(), libMesh::DofObject::invalid_id, libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::DofObject::n_comp(), libMesh::DofObject::n_comp_group(), libMesh::DofObject::n_systems(), libMesh::DofObject::n_vars(), libMesh::DofObject::start_idx(), libMesh::DofObject::system_var_to_vg_var() , 以及 libMesh::DofObject::var_to_vg().

458 {
459  libmesh_assert_less (s, this->n_systems());
460  libmesh_assert_less (var, this->n_vars(s));
461  libmesh_assert_less (comp, this->n_comp(s,var));
462 
463  const unsigned int
464  vg = this->var_to_vg(s,var),
465 #ifndef NDEBUG
466  ncg = this->n_comp_group(s,vg),
467 #endif
468  vig = this->system_var_to_vg_var(s,vg,var),
469  start_idx_sys = this->start_idx(s);
470 
471  libmesh_assert_less ((start_idx_sys + 2*vg + 1), _idx_buf.size());
472 
473  dof_id_type & base_idx = _idx_buf[start_idx_sys + 2*vg + 1];
474 
475  // We intend to change all dof numbers together or not at all
476  if (comp || vig)
477  libmesh_assert ((dn == invalid_id && base_idx == invalid_id) ||
478  (dn == base_idx + vig*ncg + comp));
479 
480  // only explicitly store the base index for vig==0, comp==0
481  else
482  base_idx = dn;
483 
484  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->dof_number(s, var, comp), dn);
485 }

void libMesh::Elem::set_interior_parent ( Elem *  p)
inherited

Sets the pointer to the element's interior_parent.

Dangerous! Only use this if you know what you are doing!

在文件 elem.C 第 1055 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::_elemlinks, libMesh::Elem::dim(), libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::Elem::n_sides() , 以及 libMesh::remote_elem.

参考自 libMesh::BoundaryInfo::add_elements(), libMesh::UnstructuredMesh::copy_nodes_and_elements(), libMesh::Edge::Edge(), libMesh::UnstructuredMesh::find_neighbors(), libMesh::Hex::Hex(), libMesh::InfHex::InfHex(), libMesh::InfQuad::InfQuad(), libMesh::NodeElem::NodeElem(), libMesh::Prism::Prism(), libMesh::Pyramid::Pyramid(), libMesh::Quad::Quad(), libMesh::Tet::Tet(), libMesh::Tri::Tri() , 以及 libMesh::Parallel::Packing< Elem * >::unpack().

1056 {
1057  // interior parents make no sense for full-dimensional elements.
1058  libmesh_assert_less (this->dim(), LIBMESH_DIM);
1059 
1060  // If we have an interior_parent, we USED TO assume it was a
1061  // one-higher-dimensional interior element, but we now allow e.g.
1062  // edge elements to have a 3D interior_parent with no
1063  // intermediate 2D element.
1064  // libmesh_assert (!p ||
1065  // p->dim() == (this->dim()+1));
1066  libmesh_assert (!p ||
1067  (p == remote_elem) ||
1068  (p->dim() > this->dim()));
1069 
1070  _elemlinks[1+this->n_sides()] = p;
1071 }

void libMesh::DofObject::set_n_comp_group ( const unsigned int  s,
const unsigned int  vg,
const unsigned int  ncomp 
)
inherited

Sets the number of components for VariableGroup vg of system s associated with this DofObject.

在文件 dof_object.C 第 397 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::_idx_buf, libMesh::DofObject::invalid_id, libMesh::DofObject::n_comp_group(), libMesh::DofObject::n_systems(), libMesh::DofObject::n_var_groups(), libMesh::DofObject::n_vars(), libMesh::DofObject::ncv_magic , 以及 libMesh::DofObject::start_idx().

参考自 libMesh::DofMap::reinit(), libMesh::DofObject::set_n_comp(), libMesh::DofObject::set_n_vars_per_group() , 以及 libMesh::DofMap::set_nonlocal_dof_objects().

400 {
401  libmesh_assert_less (s, this->n_systems());
402  libmesh_assert_less (vg, this->n_var_groups(s));
403 
404  // Check for trivial return
405  if (ncomp == this->n_comp_group(s,vg)) return;
406 
407 #ifndef NDEBUG
408  if (ncomp >= ncv_magic)
409  {
410  const index_t ncvm = ncv_magic;
411  libmesh_error_msg("ERROR: ncomp must be less than DofObject::ncv_magic!\n" \
412  << "ncomp = " \
413  << ncomp \
414  << ", ncv_magic = " \
415  << ncvm \
416  << "\nrecompile and try again!");
417  }
418 #endif
419 
420  const unsigned int
421  start_idx_sys = this->start_idx(s),
422  n_vars_group = this->n_vars(s,vg),
423  base_offset = start_idx_sys + 2*vg;
424 
425  libmesh_assert_less ((base_offset + 1), _idx_buf.size());
426 
427  // if (ncomp)
428  // libMesh::out << "s,vg,ncomp="
429  // << s << ","
430  // << vg << ","
431  // << ncomp << '\n';
432 
433  // set the number of components, maintaining the number
434  // of variables in the group
435  _idx_buf[base_offset] = ncv_magic*n_vars_group + ncomp;
436 
437  // We use (invalid_id - 1) to signify no
438  // components for this object
439  _idx_buf[base_offset + 1] = (ncomp == 0) ? invalid_id - 1 : invalid_id;
440 
441  // this->debug_buffer();
442  // libMesh::out << "s,vg = " << s << "," << vg << '\n'
443  // << "base_offset=" << base_offset << '\n'
444  // << "this->n_comp(s,vg)=" << this->n_comp(s,vg) << '\n'
445  // << "this->n_comp_group(s,vg)=" << this->n_comp_group(s,vg) << '\n'
446  // << "this->n_vars(s,vg)=" << this->n_vars(s,vg) << '\n'
447  // << "this->n_var_groups(s)=" << this->n_var_groups(s) << '\n';
448 
449  libmesh_assert_equal_to (ncomp, this->n_comp_group(s,vg));
450 }

void libMesh::DofObject::set_n_systems ( const unsigned int  s)
inherited

Sets the number of systems for this DofObject.

If this number is a change, also clears all variable count and DoF indexing associated with this DofObject.

If any extra integers are associated with this DofObject, their count and values are unchanged.

在文件 dof_object.C 第 150 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::_idx_buf, libMesh::make_range(), libMesh::DofObject::n_extra_integers(), libMesh::DofObject::n_systems(), libMesh::DofObject::n_var_groups(), libMesh::DofObject::n_vars() , 以及 libMesh::DofObject::start_idx_ints().

参考自 libMesh::DofObject::add_system(), libMesh::DofObject::clear_dofs() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::refine().

151 {
152  const unsigned int old_ns = this->n_systems();
153 
154  // Check for trivial return
155  if (ns == old_ns)
156  return;
157 
158  const unsigned int nei = this->n_extra_integers();
159  const dof_id_type header_size = ns + bool(nei);
160  const dof_id_type hdr = nei ?
161  static_cast<dof_id_type>(-static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(header_size))
162  : header_size;
163  index_buffer_t new_buf(header_size + nei, hdr);
164  if (nei)
165  {
166  const unsigned int start_idx_ints = old_ns ?
167  cast_int<unsigned int>(_idx_buf[old_ns]) :
168  1;
169  libmesh_assert_less(start_idx_ints, _idx_buf.size());
170  std::copy(_idx_buf.begin()+start_idx_ints,
171  _idx_buf.end(),
172  new_buf.begin()+header_size);
173  if (ns)
174  std::fill(new_buf.begin()+1, new_buf.begin()+ns+1, ns+1);
175  }
176 
177  // vector swap trick to force deallocation when shrinking
178  new_buf.swap(_idx_buf);
179 
180 #ifdef DEBUG
181  libmesh_assert_equal_to(nei, this->n_extra_integers());
182 
183  // check that all systems now exist and that they have 0 size
184  libmesh_assert_equal_to (ns, this->n_systems());
185  for (auto s : make_range(this->n_systems()))
186  {
187  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_vars(s), 0);
188  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_var_groups(s), 0);
189  }
190 #endif
191 }

libMesh::dof_id_type
uint8_t dof_id_type
Definition: id_types.h:67
void libMesh::DofObject::set_n_vars_per_group ( const unsigned int  s,
const std::vector< unsigned int > &  nvpg 
)
inherited

Sets number of variables in each group associated with system s for this DofObject.

Implicit in this is also setting the number of VariableGroup variable groups for the system. Has the effect of setting the number of components to 0 even when called even with (nvg == this->n_var_groups(s)).

在文件 dof_object.C 第 247 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::_idx_buf, libMesh::DofObject::end_idx(), libMesh::DofObject::get_extra_integer(), libMesh::DofObject::has_extra_integers(), libMesh::DofObject::invalid_id, libMesh::make_range(), libMesh::DofObject::n_comp(), libMesh::DofObject::n_comp_group(), libMesh::DofObject::n_extra_integers(), libMesh::DofObject::n_systems(), libMesh::DofObject::n_var_groups(), libMesh::DofObject::n_vars(), libMesh::DofObject::ncv_magic, libMesh::DofObject::set_n_comp_group() , 以及 libMesh::DofObject::start_idx().

249 {
250  const unsigned int n_sys = this->n_systems();
251 
252  libmesh_assert_less (s, n_sys);
253 
254  // number of variable groups for this system - inferred
255  const unsigned int nvg = cast_int<unsigned int>(nvpg.size());
256 
257  // BSK - note that for compatibility with the previous implementation
258  // calling this method when (nvars == this->n_vars()) requires that
259  // we invalidate the DOF indices and set the number of components to 0.
260  // Note this was a bit of a surprise to me - there was no quick return in
261  // the old method, which caused removal and readdition of the DOF indices
262  // even in the case of (nvars == this->n_vars()), resulting in n_comp(s,v)
263  // implicitly becoming 0 regardless of any previous value.
264  // quick return?
265  if (nvg == this->n_var_groups(s))
266  {
267  for (unsigned int vg=0; vg<nvg; vg++)
268  {
269  this->set_n_comp_group(s,vg,0);
270  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_vars(s,vg), nvpg[vg]);
271  }
272  return;
273  }
274 
275  const bool hei = this->has_extra_integers();
276 
277  // since there is ample opportunity to screw up other systems, let us
278  // cache their current sizes and later assert that they are unchanged.
279 #ifdef DEBUG
280  const unsigned int nei = this->n_extra_integers();
281 
282  DofObject::index_buffer_t old_system_sizes, old_extra_integers;
283  old_system_sizes.reserve(n_sys);
284  old_extra_integers.reserve(nei);
285 
286  for (unsigned int s_ctr=0; s_ctr<n_sys; s_ctr++)
287  old_system_sizes.push_back(this->n_var_groups(s_ctr));
288 
289  for (unsigned int ei=0; ei != nei; ++ei)
290  old_extra_integers.push_back(this->get_extra_integer(ei));
291 #endif
292 
293  // remove current indices if we have some
294  if (this->n_var_groups(s) != 0)
295  {
296  const unsigned int old_nvg_s = this->n_var_groups(s);
297 
298  DofObject::index_buffer_t::iterator
299  it = _idx_buf.begin(),
300  end = _idx_buf.begin();
301 
302  std::advance(it, this->start_idx(s));
303  std::advance(end, this->end_idx(s));
304  _idx_buf.erase(it,end);
305 
306  for (unsigned int ctr=(s+1); ctr<n_sys; ctr++)
307  _idx_buf[ctr] -= 2*old_nvg_s;
308 
309  if (hei)
310  _idx_buf[n_sys] -= 2*old_nvg_s;
311  }
312 
313  // better not have any now!
314  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_var_groups(s), 0);
315 
316  // Make sure we didn't screw up any of our sizes!
317 #ifdef DEBUG
318  for (auto s_ctr : make_range(this->n_systems()))
319  if (s_ctr != s)
320  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_var_groups(s_ctr), old_system_sizes[s_ctr]);
321 
322  libmesh_assert_equal_to (nei, this->n_extra_integers());
323 
324  for (unsigned int ei=0; ei != nei; ++ei)
325  libmesh_assert_equal_to(old_extra_integers[ei], this->get_extra_integer(ei));
326 #endif
327 
328  // OK, if the user requested 0 that is what we have
329  if (nvg == 0)
330  return;
331 
332  {
333  // array to hold new indices
334  DofObject::index_buffer_t var_idxs(2*nvg);
335  for (unsigned int vg=0; vg<nvg; vg++)
336  {
337  var_idxs[2*vg ] = ncv_magic*nvpg[vg] + 0;
338  var_idxs[2*vg + 1] = invalid_id - 1;
339  }
340 
341  DofObject::index_buffer_t::iterator it = _idx_buf.begin();
342  std::advance(it, this->end_idx(s));
343  _idx_buf.insert(it, var_idxs.begin(), var_idxs.end());
344 
345  for (unsigned int ctr=(s+1); ctr<n_sys; ctr++)
346  _idx_buf[ctr] += 2*nvg;
347 
348  if (hei)
349  _idx_buf[n_sys] += 2*nvg;
350 
351  // resize _idx_buf to fit so no memory is wasted.
352  DofObject::index_buffer_t(_idx_buf).swap(_idx_buf);
353  }
354 
355  libmesh_assert_equal_to (nvg, this->n_var_groups(s));
356 
357 #ifdef DEBUG
358 
359  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_var_groups(s), nvpg.size());
360 
361  for (auto vg : make_range(this->n_var_groups(s)))
362  {
363  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_vars(s,vg), nvpg[vg]);
364  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_comp_group(s,vg), 0);
365  }
366 
367  for (auto v : make_range(this->n_vars(s)))
368  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_comp(s,v), 0);
369 
370  // again, all other system sizes should be unchanged!
371  for (auto s_ctr : make_range(this->n_systems()))
372  if (s_ctr != s)
373  libmesh_assert_equal_to (this->n_var_groups(s_ctr), old_system_sizes[s_ctr]);
374 
375  // Extra integers count and values should also be unchanged!
376  libmesh_assert_equal_to (nei, this->n_extra_integers());
377 
378  for (unsigned int ei=0; ei != nei; ++ei)
379  libmesh_assert_equal_to(old_extra_integers[ei], this->get_extra_integer(ei));
380 #endif
381 }

void libMesh::Elem::set_p_level ( const unsigned int  p)
inherited

Sets the value of the p-refinement level for the element.

The following functions only apply when AMR is enabled and thus are not present otherwise.

注解
The maximum p-refinement level is currently 255.

在文件 elem_refinement.C 第 41 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::_p_level, libMesh::Elem::child_ref_range(), libMesh::Elem::hack_p_level(), libMesh::Elem::JUST_COARSENED, libMesh::Elem::JUST_REFINED, libMesh::Elem::p_level(), libMesh::Elem::parent(), libMesh::Elem::set_p_level() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::set_p_refinement_flag().

参考自 libMesh::UnstructuredMesh::all_first_order(), libMesh::Elem::coarsen(), libMesh::Elem::Elem(), libMesh::Elem::refine(), libMesh::Elem::set_p_level() , 以及 libMesh::Parallel::Packing< Elem * >::unpack().

42 {
43  // Maintain the parent's p level as the minimum of it's children
44  if (this->parent() != nullptr)
45  {
46  unsigned int parent_p_level = this->parent()->p_level();
47 
48  // If our new p level is less than our parents, our parents drops
49  if (parent_p_level > p)
50  {
51  this->parent()->set_p_level(p);
52 
53  // And we should keep track of the drop, in case we need to
54  // do a projection later.
55  this->parent()->set_p_refinement_flag(Elem::JUST_COARSENED);
56  }
57  // If we are the lowest p level and it increases, so might
58  // our parent's, but we have to check every other child to see
59  else if (parent_p_level == _p_level && _p_level < p)
60  {
61  _p_level = cast_int<unsigned char>(p);
62  parent_p_level = cast_int<unsigned char>(p);
63  for (auto & c : this->parent()->child_ref_range())
64  parent_p_level = std::min(parent_p_level,
65  c.p_level());
66 
67  // When its children all have a higher p level, the parent's
68  // should rise
69  if (parent_p_level > this->parent()->p_level())
70  {
71  this->parent()->set_p_level(parent_p_level);
72 
73  // And we should keep track of the rise, in case we need to
74  // do a projection later.
75  this->parent()->set_p_refinement_flag(Elem::JUST_REFINED);
76  }
77 
78  return;
79  }
80  }
81 
82  this->hack_p_level(p);
83 }

std::unique_ptr< const Elem > libMesh::Elem::side_ptr ( unsigned int  i) const
inlineinherited

在文件 elem.h 第 2495 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::side_ptr().

2496 {
2497  // Call the non-const version of this function, return the result as
2498  // a std::unique_ptr<const Elem>.
2499  Elem * me = const_cast<Elem *>(this);
2500  const Elem * s = const_cast<const Elem *>(me->side_ptr(i).release());

true if the element is subactive (i.e. has no active descendants), false otherwise or if AMR is disabled.

const Elem * libMesh::Elem::top_parent ( ) const
inlineinherited
返回
A pointer to the element's top-most (i.e. level-0) parent.

That is, this if this is a level-0 element, this element's parent if this is a level-1 element, this element's grandparent if this is a level-2 element, etc...

在文件 elem.h 第 2869 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::level(), libMesh::libmesh_assert() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::parent().

参考自 libMesh::BoundaryInfo::_find_id_maps(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::add_elements(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::boundary_ids(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::edge_boundary_ids(), libMesh::MeshTools::libmesh_assert_valid_amr_interior_parents(), libMesh::ExodusII_IO::read_elemental_variable(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::side_with_boundary_id() , 以及 libMesh::BoundaryInfo::sides_with_boundary_id().

2870 {
2871  const Elem * tp = this;
2872 
2873  // Keep getting the element's parent
2874  // until that parent is at level-0
2875  while (tp->parent() != nullptr)
2876  tp = tp->parent();
2877 
2878  libmesh_assert(tp);
2879  libmesh_assert_equal_to (tp->level(), 0);
2880 
2881  return tp;
2882 }

const Elem * libMesh::Elem::topological_neighbor ( const unsigned int  i,
const MeshBase &  mesh,
const PointLocatorBase &  point_locator,
const PeriodicBoundaries *  pb 
) const
inherited
返回
A pointer to the neighbor of this element for interior elements. If an element is on a periodic boundary, it will return a corresponding element on the opposite side.

在文件 elem.C 第 1119 行定义.

参考 libMesh::PeriodicBoundaries::boundary(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::boundary_ids(), libMesh::MeshBase::get_boundary_info(), libMesh::Elem::level(), libMesh::Elem::n_neighbors(), libMesh::PeriodicBoundaries::neighbor(), libMesh::Elem::neighbor_ptr() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::parent().

参考自 libMesh::Elem::has_topological_neighbor() , 以及 libMesh::MeshRefinement::topological_neighbor().

1123 {
1124  libmesh_assert_less (i, this->n_neighbors());
1125 
1126  const Elem * neighbor_i = this->neighbor_ptr(i);
1127  if (neighbor_i != nullptr)
1128  return neighbor_i;
1129 
1130  if (pb)
1131  {
1132  // Since the neighbor is nullptr it must be on a boundary. We need
1133  // see if this is a periodic boundary in which case it will have a
1134  // topological neighbor
1135  std::vector<boundary_id_type> bc_ids;
1136  mesh.get_boundary_info().boundary_ids(this, cast_int<unsigned short>(i), bc_ids);
1137  for (const auto & id : bc_ids)
1138  if (pb->boundary(id))
1139  {
1140  neighbor_i = pb->neighbor(id, point_locator, this, i);
1141 
1142  // Since coarse elements do not have more refined
1143  // neighbors we need to make sure that we don't return one
1144  // of these types of neighbors.
1145  if (neighbor_i)
1146  while (level() < neighbor_i->level())
1147  neighbor_i = neighbor_i->parent();
1148  return neighbor_i;
1149  }
1150  }
1151 
1152  return nullptr;
1153 }

)
inherited
返回
A writable pointer to the neighbor of this element for interior elements. If an element is on a periodic boundary, it will return a corresponding element on the opposite side.

在文件 elem.C 第 1077 行定义.

参考 libMesh::PeriodicBoundaries::boundary(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::boundary_ids(), libMesh::MeshBase::get_boundary_info(), libMesh::Elem::level(), libMesh::Elem::n_neighbors(), libMesh::PeriodicBoundaries::neighbor(), libMesh::Elem::neighbor_ptr() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::parent().

1081 {
1082  libmesh_assert_less (i, this->n_neighbors());
1083 
1084  Elem * neighbor_i = this->neighbor_ptr(i);
1085  if (neighbor_i != nullptr)
1086  return neighbor_i;
1087 
1088  if (pb)
1089  {
1090  // Since the neighbor is nullptr it must be on a boundary. We need
1091  // see if this is a periodic boundary in which case it will have a
1092  // topological neighbor
1093  std::vector<boundary_id_type> bc_ids;
1094  mesh.get_boundary_info().boundary_ids(this, cast_int<unsigned short>(i), bc_ids);
1095  for (const auto & id : bc_ids)
1096  if (pb->boundary(id))
1097  {
1098  // Since the point locator inside of periodic boundaries
1099  // returns a const pointer we will retrieve the proper
1100  // pointer directly from the mesh object.
1101  const Elem * const cn = pb->neighbor(id, point_locator, this, i);
1102  neighbor_i = const_cast<Elem *>(cn);
1103 
1104  // Since coarse elements do not have more refined
1105  // neighbors we need to make sure that we don't return one
1106  // of these types of neighbors.
1107  if (neighbor_i)
1108  while (level() < neighbor_i->level())
1109  neighbor_i = neighbor_i->parent();
1110  return neighbor_i;
1111  }
1112  }
1113 
1114  return nullptr;
1115 }

Definition: elem.h:2887
bool libMesh::Elem::topologically_equal ( const Elem &  rhs) const
inherited
返回
true if two elements have equal topologies, false otherwise. This is true if the elements connect to nodes of the same id in the same order, and neighbors of the same id on each side, the same id on any parent and/or interior_parent link, etc.

在文件 elem.C 第 612 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::id(), libMesh::Elem::interior_parent(), libMesh::make_range(), libMesh::Elem::n_neighbors(), libMesh::Elem::n_nodes(), libMesh::Elem::neighbor_ptr(), libMesh::Elem::node_id(), libMesh::Elem::parent() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::type().

613 {
614  // If the elements aren't the same type, they aren't equal
615  if (this->type() != rhs.type())
616  return false;
617 
618  libmesh_assert_equal_to(this->n_nodes(), rhs.n_nodes());
619 
620  for (auto n : make_range(this->n_nodes()))
621  if (this->node_id(n) != rhs.node_id(n))
622  return false;
623 
624  for (auto neigh : make_range(this->n_neighbors()))
625  {
626  if (!this->neighbor_ptr(neigh))
627  {
628  if (rhs.neighbor_ptr(neigh))
629  return false;
630  continue;
631  }
632  if (!rhs.neighbor_ptr(neigh) ||
633  this->neighbor_ptr(neigh)->id() !=
634  rhs.neighbor_ptr(neigh)->id())
635  return false;
636  }
637 
638  if (this->parent())
639  {
640  if (!rhs.parent())
641  return false;
642  if (this->parent()->id() != rhs.parent()->id())
643  return false;
644  }
645  else if (rhs.parent())
646  return false;
647 
648  if (this->interior_parent())
649  {
650  if (!rhs.interior_parent())
651  return false;
652  if (this->interior_parent()->id() !=
653  rhs.interior_parent()->id())
654  return false;
655  }
656  else if (rhs.interior_parent())
657  return false;
658 
659  return true;
660 }

void libMesh::DofObject::unpack_indexing ( std::vector< largest_id_type >::const_iterator  begin)
inherited

A method for creating our index buffer from packed data - basically with our current implementation we investigate the size term and then copy.

在文件 dof_object.C 第 595 行定义.

参考 libMesh::DofObject::_idx_buf, std::abs(), libMesh::DofObject::clear_old_dof_object(), libMesh::DofObject::construct(), libMesh::libmesh_assert() , 以及 libMesh::DofObject::old_dof_object.

参考自 libMesh::Parallel::Packing< Elem * >::unpack().

596 {
597  _idx_buf.clear();
598 
599 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
600  this->clear_old_dof_object();
601  const bool has_old_dof_object = cast_int<bool>(*begin++);
602 #endif
603 
604  const largest_id_type size = *begin++;
605  _idx_buf.reserve(size);
606  std::copy(begin, begin+size, back_inserter(_idx_buf));
607 
608  // Check as best we can for internal consistency now
609  libmesh_assert(_idx_buf.empty() ||
610  (std::abs(dof_id_signed_type(_idx_buf[0])) <=
611  cast_int<dof_id_signed_type>(_idx_buf.size())));
612 #ifdef DEBUG
613  if (!_idx_buf.empty())
614  {
615  const int hdr = cast_int<int>(dof_id_signed_type(_idx_buf[0]));
616  const unsigned int ns = hdr >= 0 ? hdr : (-hdr-1);
617  for (unsigned int i=1; i < ns; ++i)
618  {
619  if (hdr > 0 || i > 1)
620  libmesh_assert_greater_equal (_idx_buf[i], _idx_buf[i-1]);
621  else
622  libmesh_assert_greater_equal (_idx_buf[i], ns);
623  libmesh_assert_equal_to ((_idx_buf[i] - _idx_buf[i-1])%2, 0);
624  libmesh_assert_less_equal (_idx_buf[i], _idx_buf.size());
625  }
626  if (hdr < 0 && ns > 0)
627  libmesh_assert_less_equal(_idx_buf[ns], _idx_buf.size());
628  }
629 #endif
630 
631 #ifdef LIBMESH_ENABLE_AMR
632  if (has_old_dof_object)
633  {
634  this->old_dof_object = this->construct();
635  this->old_dof_object->unpack_indexing(begin+size);
636  }
637 #endif
638 }

参考自 libMesh::DofMap::_dof_indices(), libMesh::DofMap::_node_dof_indices(), libMesh::DofObject::dof_number(), libMesh::OldSolutionCoefs< Output, point_output >::eval_old_dofs() , 以及 libMesh::OldSolutionValue< Output, point_output >::eval_old_dofs().

1195 {
1196  std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> returnval(0,0);
1197 
1198  unsigned int & vg = returnval.first;
1199  unsigned int & offset = returnval.second;
1200 
1201  unsigned int vg_start = 0;
1202  for (; ; vg++)
1203  {
1204  libmesh_assert_less(vg, this->n_var_groups(s));
1205 
1206  const unsigned int vg_end = vg_start + this->n_vars(s,vg);
1207  if (var < vg_end)
1208  {
1209  offset = var - vg_start;
1210  return returnval;
1211  }
1212  vg_start = vg_end;
1213  }
1214 }

Point libMesh::Elem::vertex_average ( ) const
inherited
返回
A Point at the average of the elment's vertices.
注解
This used to be the base class centroid() implementation, but the centroid is only equal to the vertex average in some special cases. The centroid() implementation now returns the "true" centroid of the element (up to quadrature error).

在文件 elem.C 第 497 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::n_vertices().

参考自 libMesh::Elem::centroid(), libMesh::UnstructuredMesh::find_neighbors(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::get_side_and_node_maps(), libMesh::Poly2TriTriangulator::insert_refinement_points(), libMesh::LocationMap< T >::point_of(), libMesh::FE< Dim, T >::shape_deriv(), libMesh::FE< Dim, T >::shape_second_deriv(), libMesh::Tri3::true_centroid() , 以及 libMesh::Tet4::true_centroid().

498 {
499  Point cp;
500 
501  const auto n_vertices = this->n_vertices();
502 
503  for (unsigned int n=0; n<n_vertices; n++)
504  cp.add (this->point(n));
505 
506  return (cp /= static_cast<Real>(n_vertices));
507 }

unsigned int libMesh::Elem::which_child_am_i ( const Elem *  e) const
inlineinherited
返回
The child index which e corresponds to.

I.e. if c = a->which_child_am_i(e); then a->child_ptr(c) will be e.

libMesh::Elem::local_side_node
virtual unsigned int local_side_node(unsigned int side, unsigned int side_node) const =0
unsigned int libMesh::Elem::which_side_am_i ( const Elem *  e) const
inherited

This function tells you which side the boundary element e is.

I.e. if e = a->build_side_ptr(s) or e = a->side_ptr(s); then a->which_side_am_i(e) will be s.

注解
An exact floating point comparison of the nodal positions of e is made with the nodal positions of this in order to perform this test. The idea is that the test will return a valid side id if e either directly shares Node pointers with this, or was created by exactly copying some of the nodes of this (e.g. through BoundaryMesh::sync()). In these circumstances, non-fuzzy floating point equality is expected.
返回
The side of this the element which e is, otherwise invalid_uint.

在文件 elem.C 第 679 行定义.

参考 libMesh::invalid_uint, libMesh::Elem::is_node_on_side(), libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::Elem::n_nodes(), libMesh::Elem::n_sides() , 以及 libMesh::Elem::point().

680 {
681  libmesh_assert(e);
682 
683  const unsigned int ns = this->n_sides();
684  const unsigned int nn = this->n_nodes();
685 
686  const unsigned int en = e->n_nodes();
687 
688  // e might be on any side until proven otherwise
689  std::vector<bool> might_be_side(ns, true);
690 
691  for (unsigned int i=0; i != en; ++i)
692  {
693  Point side_point = e->point(i);
694  unsigned int local_node_id = libMesh::invalid_uint;
695 
696  // Look for a node of this that's contiguous with node i of
697  // e. Note that the exact floating point comparison of Point
698  // positions is intentional, see the class documentation for
699  // this function.
700  for (unsigned int j=0; j != nn; ++j)
701  if (this->point(j) == side_point)
702  local_node_id = j;
703 
704  // If a node of e isn't contiguous with some node of this, then
705  // e isn't a side of this.
706  if (local_node_id == libMesh::invalid_uint)
707  return libMesh::invalid_uint;
708 
709  // If a node of e isn't contiguous with some node on side s of
710  // this, then e isn't on side s.
711  for (unsigned int s=0; s != ns; ++s)
712  if (!this->is_node_on_side(local_node_id, s))
713  might_be_side[s] = false;
714  }
715 
716  for (unsigned int s=0; s != ns; ++s)
717  if (might_be_side[s])
718  {
719 #ifdef DEBUG
720  for (unsigned int s2=s+1; s2 < ns; ++s2)
721  libmesh_assert (!might_be_side[s2]);
722 #endif
723  return s;
724  }
725 
726  // Didn't find any matching side
727  return libMesh::invalid_uint;
728 }
libMesh::invalid_uint
const unsigned int invalid_uint
A number which is used quite often to represent an invalid or uninitialized value for an unsigned int...
Definition: libmesh.h:254

virtual bool is_node_on_side(const unsigned int n, const unsigned int s) const =0

libmesh_assert(ctx)

void libMesh::Elem::write_connectivity ( std::ostream &  out,
const IOPackage  iop 
) const
inherited

Writes the element connectivity for various IO packages to the passed ostream "out".

Not virtual, since it is implemented in the base class.

在文件 elem.C 第 1537 行定义.

参考 libMesh::Elem::_nodes, libMesh::Elem::connectivity(), libMesh::INVALID_IO_PACKAGE, libMesh::libmesh_assert(), libMesh::make_range(), libMesh::Elem::n_sub_elem(), libMesh::Elem::node_id(), libMesh::Elem::node_index_range(), libMesh::TECPLOT , 以及 libMesh::UCD.

1539 {
1540  libmesh_assert (out_stream.good());
1541  libmesh_assert(_nodes);
1542  libmesh_assert_not_equal_to (iop, INVALID_IO_PACKAGE);
1543 
1544  switch (iop)
1545  {
1546  case TECPLOT:
1547  {
1548  // This connectivity vector will be used repeatedly instead
1549  // of being reconstructed inside the loop.
1550  std::vector<dof_id_type> conn;
1551  for (auto sc : make_range(this->n_sub_elem()))
1552  {
1553  this->connectivity(sc, TECPLOT, conn);
1554 
1555  std::copy(conn.begin(),
1556  conn.end(),
1557  std::ostream_iterator<dof_id_type>(out_stream, " "));
1558 
1559  out_stream << '\n';
1560  }
1561  return;
1562  }
1563 
1564  case UCD:
1565  {
1566  for (auto i : this->node_index_range())
1567  out_stream << this->node_id(i)+1 << "\t";
1568 
1569  out_stream << '\n';
1570  return;
1571  }
1572 
1573  default:
1574  libmesh_error_msg("Unsupported IO package " << iop);
1575  }
1576 }

类成员变量说明

std::unique_ptr<Elem *[]> libMesh::Elem::_children
protectedinherited

unique_ptr to array of this element's children.

A Mesh ultimately owns the child Elems so we are not responsible for deleting them, but we are responsible for cleaning up the array allocated to hold those Elems, hence the unique_ptr.

unsigned char libMesh::Elem::_p_level
protectedinherited

p refinement level - the difference between the polynomial degree on this element and the minimum polynomial degree on the mesh.

This is stored as an unsigned char to save space. In theory, these last four bytes might have been padding anyway.

const subdomain_id_type libMesh::Elem::invalid_subdomain_id = std::numeric_limits<subdomain_id_type>::max()
staticinherited

A static integral constant representing an invalid subdomain id.

See also DofObject::{invalid_id, invalid_unique_id, invalid_processor_id}.

注解
We don't use the static_cast(-1) trick here since subdomain_id_type is sometimes a signed integer for compatibility reasons (see libmesh/id_types.h).
Normally you can declare static const integral types directly in the header file (C++ standard, 9.4.2/4) but std::numeric_limits<T>::max() is not considered a "constant expression". This one is therefore defined in elem.C. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2738435/using-numeric-limitsmax-in-constant-expressions

在文件 elem.h 第 238 行定义.

参考自 libMesh::BoundaryInfo::_find_id_maps(), libMesh::BoundaryInfo::add_elements(), libMesh::ReplicatedMesh::get_disconnected_subdomains(), libMesh::MeshBase::get_id_by_name() , 以及 libMesh::BoundaryInfo::sync().

std::unique_ptr<DofObject> libMesh::DofObject::old_dof_object
protectedinherited

This object on the last mesh.

Useful for projecting solutions from one mesh to another.

Public access to old_dof_object is now officially deprecated and will be removed in future libMesh versions. Use the get_old_dof_object() accessor instead.

在文件 dof_object.h 第 88 行定义.
